sn22.29:1.2: “Mendicants, if you take pleasure in form, you take pleasure in suffering.
sn22.29:1.3: If you take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re not exempt from suffering.
sn22.29:1.4: If you take pleasure in feeling …
sn22.29:1.7: consciousness, you take pleasure in suffering.
sn22.29:1.8: If you take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re not exempt from suffering.
sn22.29:1.9: If you don’t take pleasure in form, you don’t take pleasure in suffering.
sn22.29:1.10: If you don’t take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re exempt from suffering.
sn22.29:1.11: If you don’t take pleasure in feeling …
sn22.29:1.14: consciousness, you don’t take pleasure in suffering.
sn22.29:1.15: If you don’t take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re exempt from suffering.”
